meta.title: Privacy Policy
meta.description: Learn how Nostr Web of Trust protects your privacy. Our policy covers data collection, browser extension privacy modes, Oracle API usage, and your rights.

intro.description: This Privacy Policy describes how Nostr Web of Trust ("we", "us", or "our") collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our website (nostr-wot.com) and browser extension (WoT Extension).
intro.commitment: We are committed to protecting your privacy. As a project built for the Nostr ecosystem, we understand the importance of decentralization and user sovereignty over personal data.

infoCollected.title: Information We Collect
infoCollected.description: When you visit our website, we may collect:

analytics.title: Analytics Data:
analytics.description: We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors use our site. This includes anonymized information such as pages visited, time spent on site, browser type, device type, and approximate geographic location (country level).

contactForm.title: Contact Form Data:
contactForm.description: If you submit our contact form, we collect your name, email address, organization (if provided), and message content.

items.improve: To improve our website and documentation
items.respond: To respond to your inquiries and support requests

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: Our website uses cookies for analytics purposes. Google Analytics sets cookies to distinguish unique users and sessions. You can opt out of Google Analytics by installing the

extension.title: Browser Extension Privacy
extension.intro: The WoT Extension is designed with privacy as a core principle. Here's what you need to know:

pubkey.title: Your Pubkey:
pubkey.description: Stored locally in your browser to identify your position in the social graph. Never sent to our servers.

configuration.title: Configuration:
configuration.description: Your settings (operating mode, relay preferences, oracle URL) are stored locally in your browser.

localGraph.title: Local Graph Index:
localGraph.description: In Local or Hybrid mode, follow relationships are stored in your browser's IndexedDB. This data never leaves your device.

operatingModes.title: Operating Modes
operatingModes.description: The extension offers three operating modes with different privacy implications:

items.processedLocally: All queries are processed locally in your browser
items.fetchedDirectly: Follow data is fetched directly from Nostr relays
items.noDataSent: No data is sent to the WoT Oracle or our servers

items.sentToOracle: Queries are sent to the WoT Oracle API to calculate social distance
items.oracleSees: The Oracle sees which pubkeys you are querying (but not your identity unless you reveal it)
items.fasterResults: Provides faster results with less local storage
items.selfHost: Consider using a self-hosted Oracle for enhanced privacy

items.fallback: Falls back to Remote mode only when needed

doesNot.title: What the Extension Does NOT Do

items.browsingHistory: We do not collect or transmit your browsing history
items.ads: We do not inject ads or tracking scripts
items.sellData: We do not sell or share your data with third parties
items.privateKeys: We do not store your private keys (we never have access to them)
items.telemetry: We do not run analytics or telemetry in the extension

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.description: The extension requests the following browser permissions:

storage.title: Storage:
storage.description: To save your configuration and local graph index

scripting.title: Scripting:
scripting.description: To inject the window.nostr.wot API into web pages

oracle.title: WoT Oracle API
oracle.intro: If you use the public WoT Oracle API (directly or through the extension in Remote mode):

queryData.title: Query Data:
queryData.description: The pubkeys you query for social distance calculations

ipAddress.title: IP Address:
ipAddress.description: Used for rate limiting (100 requests/minute per IP)

timestamps.title: Request Timestamps:
timestamps.description: For rate limiting and abuse prevention

items.noLog: We do not log query history long-term
items.noAssociate: We do not associate queries with identities
items.noTrack: We do not track which websites make queries

selfHosting.title: Self-Hosting
selfHosting.descriptionContinued: . This gives you complete control over your query data.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: Our website uses the following third-party services:

googleAnalytics.title: Google Analytics
googleAnalytics.description: We use Google Analytics to analyze website traffic. Google may collect and process data according to their
googleAnalytics.configured: . We have configured Google Analytics to:

recaptcha.title: Google reCAPTCHA
recaptcha.description: Our contact form uses Google reCAPTCHA v3 to prevent spam. This service may collect hardware and software information. See Google's

resend.title: Resend
resend.description: We use Resend to process contact form submissions. Your contact information is transmitted to Resend to deliver emails. See Resend's

nostrRelays.title: Nostr Relays
nostrRelays.description: In Local mode, the extension connects directly to Nostr relays to fetch follow lists. These are public Nostr relays; their data handling practices vary. The extension only fetches public Kind 3 (follow list) events.

analytics.title: Analytics Data:
analytics.description: Retained by Google Analytics for 14 months

contactForm.title: Contact Form Submissions:
contactForm.description: Retained in our email system until the inquiry is resolved

extensionData.title: Extension Data:
extensionData.description: Stored locally in your browser until you clear it or uninstall the extension

rateLimit.title: Oracle Rate Limit Data:
rateLimit.description: IP-based rate limit counters expire after 1 minute

access.title: Access:
access.description: Request information about data we hold about you

deletion.title: Deletion:
deletion.description: Request deletion of your personal data

optOut.title: Opt-out:
optOut.description: Disable Google Analytics tracking using browser tools

control.title: Control:
control.description: Clear extension data at any time through browser settings

portability.title: Portability:
portability.description: Export your local graph data from the extension

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
changes.significant: For significant changes, we may provide additional notice such as adding a statement to our homepage or sending you a notification.
